publication.title: A disk-based parallel implementation for direct condensation of large permutation modules
publication.jconf: International Symposium on Symbolic and Algebraic Computation
publication.abstract: Through the use of a new disk-based method for enumerat- ing very large orbits, condensation for orbits with tens of bil- lions of elements can be performed. The algorithm is novel in that it oers ecien t access to data using distributed disk- based data structures. This provides fast access to hundreds of gigabytes of data, which allows for computing
